posts.post_title: FT: Foster, Charleston T206 Old Mill
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric S.
I would prefer to trade this card for others I need instead of sell.  Here's a list of what I'm looking for:

T206 - Cubs
Evers portrait
Tinker portrait
Tinker batt off

T206 - White Sox
Duffy batting

T206- Cleveland
C. Young portrait
C. Young bare hand
Lajoie portrait

[IMG]http://i551.photobucket.com/albums/ii477/tao_moko/scan001001.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i551.photobucket.com/albums/ii477/tao_moko/scan002001.jpg[/IMG]

Email scanned images to h8ful21@yahoo.com.
